revisions.text:
8 reads of walk ins but no text about how they are handled - I've removed reference to the walk-ins. (Eric Ose)

This document presents itself as a policy, but I find no proposals to make it a policy. Perhaps we should rename this workshop process, or event/workshop process.

Either way I'll be re-writing this to conform to our current practice.

There was reference to a volunteer that would do both marketing including social media, volunteer coordination, cleaning. I removed that entirely as no such position is or will exist as it would be too demanding.

revisions.comment: Created page with "8 reads of walk ins but no text about how they are handled"
revisions.text: 8 reads of walk ins but no text about how they are handled
